sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_fe03ae1c073820102001f1e08c1ed0f9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco Security Advisories Bulletins TM">9cbbc160db502010c81a7b8239961997</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	var resultSecAdvBulletin = dao.createReferences(target.psirt_cold_id, "psirt_cold_id", "psirt_cold_id_ref", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories", true);

	var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories","","match_confidence=Vulnerable^psirt_cold_id=" + target.psirt_cold_id + "");
	target.vulnerable_devices_count = calculatedFieldValue;
	target.update();	
	
	var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_security_advisories","","match_confidence=Potentially Vulnerable^psirt_cold_id=" + target.psirt_cold_id + "");
	target.potentially_vulnerable_devices_count = calculatedFieldValue;
	target.update();	

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-26 16:40:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe03ae1c073820102001f1e08c1ed0f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_fe03ae1c073820102001f1e08c1ed0f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-15 10:26:18</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
